section.name: Commons Virtual File System
section.p: Commons VFS provides a single API for accessing various different file systems. It presents a uniform view of the files from various different sources, such as the files on local disk, on an HTTP server, or inside a Zip archive.
Some of the features of Commons VFS are:

ul.li: A single API for accessing files of different types.
Support for numerous file system types.
Utilities like a VFS-aware ClassLoader and URLStreamHandlerFactory.
A set of VFS Ant tasks.
